description:
At the personal injury law office of Plaxen & Adler, P.A., we understand the challenges victims of negligence face because we have been serving victims in the Seabrook, Maryland, area for nearly 30 years. If you live in or near Seabrook, and you are suffering because of the negligence of another person, manufacturer or other entity, you can turn to our law firm for help. We have years of experience assisting those who are suffering from the following:

  • Car, truck, motorcycle, bicycle and pedestrian accidents, including those involving commercial and emergency vehicles
  • Defective products
  • Dog bites
  • Dangerous premises
  • Fungal meningitis
  • Medical malpractice, including misdiagnoses, birth errors and surgical errors
  • Work-related accidents
  • Wrongful death

In addition, our attorneys regularly assist clients with workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims and appeals.

Our law office is home to three experienced attorneys, founder Bruce M. Plaxen, partner and principal Harry R. Adler, and associate attorney David A. Muncy. Together, these three outstanding attorneys have more than 60 years of experience and extensive legal knowledge. As a result of their abilities as personal injury attorneys, our law firm enjoys one of the most successful records in the state.

If you are suffering at the hands of a negligent party, you can put our experience to work for you by scheduling a free initial consultation. If you are unable to meet with us during standard law office hours, we will be happy to meet with you in the evening or on a weekend. Additionally, if you are unable to travel due to your injuries or disability, one of our attorneys will come to you.
